title: Learning Facilitator Role Training Program for Hospice Palliative Care Team Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Concepts of Hospice Palliative Care and Basic Nursing Knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasis on connecting theory and practice through simulation-based assessments and task feedback

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more roles of a learning facilitator within a hospice palliative care team
Learners can perform doctor-nurse collaboration scenarios in a simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can design two learning facilitation strategies through case analyses reflecting real clinical settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
